la.matrix

Class DenseMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • la.matrix.DenseMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Matrix

    public class DenseMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matrix, java.io.Serializable
    A Java implementation of dense matrices.
    Version:
    1.0 Nov. 29th, 2013
    Author:
    Mingjie Qian
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DenseMatrix() 
      DenseMatrix(double v)
      Construct a 1 x 1 dense matrix with the given real number v.
      DenseMatrix(double[][] data)
      Construct a dense matrix given the data.
      DenseMatrix(double[] data, int dim)
      Construct a column or row matrix specified by a dimension parameter.
      DenseMatrix(int[] size)
      Construct an all-zero dense matrix with a specified size.
      DenseMatrix(int[] size, double v)
      Construct a dense matrix with a specified size and initialize all elements by a real number v.
      DenseMatrix(int M, int N)
      Construct an M x N all-zero dense matrix.
      DenseMatrix(int M, int N, double v)
      Construct an M x N dense matrix and initialize all elements by a real number v.
